item.description: https://productled.com/product-qualified-leads/ A product qualified lead (PQL) is a lead who has experienced meaningful value using your product through a free trial or freemium model.
Tags: [[Email]] [[Marketing]] - [[Audience]] [[Customer]] [[Local]] Author: [[Seth Godin]] Highlights: # With few exceptions, that’s being replaced by a return to clusters.

https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesbusinesscouncil/2019/11/21/consumers-are-hungry-for-an-experience-based-connection-with-your-brand/ According to one study, 83% of consumers admit paying as much attention to how brands treat them as on the product they sell.

Tags: [[Article]] [[Marketing]] - [[Entrepreneurship]] [[Validation]] Author: [[Alex Hillman]] From: https://stackingthebricks.com/validation-is-backwards/ Highlights: # On one hand, it’s possible that Lean methods could protect you from making a huge mistake, by making many smaller mistakes instead.
